title: MMR Adrenaline Aero brings more speed, stability and style to their latest aero road bike
content:
‘Tis the season for new bikes from MMR. It’s been a busy year for the folks behind the Spanish bicycle company with a penchant for making high-end race bikes. Hot off the release of the latest Kenta XC mountain bike range, MMR has dropped yet another new offering. This time, MMR stuck to the pavement

The post MMR Adrenaline Aero brings more speed, stability and style to their latest aero road bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Mark Wilson
